name: Polwarth, & Blue Faced Leicester, Hand Pulled Top / Roving - Sherbet (2.05 oz / 58 gm)
description:
This listing is for one braid of top in my Sherbet colorway. Another fun and tasty colorway that will have your taste buds watering. It looks like a luscious mix of fun sherbet flavors that are ready to melt on your tongue. It is bright, and sassy, and unlike the real thing, it will not melt in your hands. 

Hand pulled top is a labor of love, and is as fun to spin as it is to make. I blend various fibers on my drum carder, often carding multiple times. I then take a diz, and carefully pull off the fiber into top. There may be some thick and thin spots in the roving, that is simply the nature of hand pulled top. Try some of this today - I just know you will love it!

This colorway is repeatable, if you would like more, feel free to ask. As with all of my hand dyed colors, this is dyed with Greener Shades Dyes.

Fiber: Polwarth, Blue Faced Leicester
Colors: Bright colors of yellow/green, light pink, and dark pink. 
Weight: 2.05 oz / 58 gm

name: Blue Faced Leicester, Polwarth, & Angelina Hand Pulled Top / Roving - Limone (2.35 oz / 66 gm)
description:
This listing is for one braid of top in my Limone colorway. How much fun is this one? It almost makes my mouth water with the taste of lemon / lime. So crisp and refreshing. Let's not forget the touch of sparkle to represent the way it would sparkle in your glass. Bring this home today and quench your fiber thirst.

Hand pulled top is a labor of love, and is as fun to spin as it is to make. I blend various fibers on my drum carder, often carding multiple times. I then take a diz, and carefully pull off the fiber into top. There may be some thick and thin spots in the roving, that is simply the nature of hand pulled top. Try some of this today - I just know you will love it!

This colorway is repeatable, if you would like more, feel free to ask. As with all of my hand dyed colors, this is dyed with Greener Shades Dyes.

Fiber: Polwarth, BFL, Angelina 
Colors: Citrus yellow and dark green. 
Weight: 2.35 oz / 66 gm

name: Polwarth, & Angelina Hand Pulled Top / Roving - Rose
description:
This listing is for one braid of top in my Rose colorway. This is a perfect blend of a deep dark pink, and a very soft petal pink. There are small amounts of black and pink Angelina scattered throughout for just a hint of sparkle. Just looking at this makes you dream of sun streaming down on a beautiful rose bush. Glints sparkling off of the petals from fresh morning dew. So pretty.

Hand pulled top is a labor of love, and is as fun to spin as it is to make. I blend various fibers on my drum carder, often carding multiple times. I then take a diz, and carefully pull off the fiber into top. There may be some thick and thin spots in the roving, that is simply the nature of hand pulled top. Try some of this today - I just know you will love it!

This colorway is repeatable, if you would like more, feel free to ask. As with all of my hand dyed colors, this is dyed with Greener Shades Dyes.

Fiber: Polwarth, Angelina 
Colors: Dark pink, and petal pink. 
Weight: multiple weights available.

name: Blue Faced Leicester Hand Pulled Top / Roving - Silken (2.50 oz / 70 gm)
description:
This listing is for one braid of hand pulled top in my Silken colorway. This is one of my favorite colorways. The soft, sky blue, and peaceful sea green combine to form a very beautiful, complimentary colorway. It is soft, soothing and just perfection to look at. Made with Blue Faced Leicester means it will have a beautiful shimmer / sheen as well.

Hand pulled top is a labor of love, and is as fun to spin as it is to make. I blend various fibers on my drum carder, often carding multiple times. I then take a diz, and carefully pull off the fiber into top. There may be some thick and thin spots in the roving, that is simply the nature of hand pulled top. Try some of this today - I just know you will love it!

This colorway is repeatable, if you would like more, feel free to ask. As with all of my hand dyed colors, this is dyed with Greener Shades Dyes.

Fiber: Blue Faced Leicester
Colors: Soft sky blue, gentle sea foam green. 
Weight: 2.50 oz / 70 gm

name: Polwarth, BFL, Bamboo, Angelina Hand Pulled Top / Roving - Forsaken
description:
This listing is for one braid of top in my Forsaken colorway. This colorway combines the richness of deep, tawny brown with a soft blue. Added in for fun is some bronze Angelina. This is a wonderful mix of some of my favorite fibers, and is sure to spin up into a beautiful yarn with a touch of sparkle!

Hand pulled top is a labor of love, and is as fun to spin as it is to make. I blend various fibers on my drum carder, often carding multiple times. I then take a diz, and carefully pull off the fiber into top. There may be some thick and thin spots in the roving, that is simply the nature of hand pulled top. Try some of this today - I just know you will love it!

This colorway is NOT repeatable. As with all of my hand dyed colors, this is dyed with Greener Shades Dyes.

Fiber: Polwarth, BFL, Bamboo, Angelina
Colors: Rich tawny / caramel browns, soft blues.
Weight: multiple weights available.
Note: The bamboo in this top was dyed by Moonwood Farm.
